BuildType.Name: Java Ant Javadoc
BuildType.Description: Used to create documentation using the Ant Javadoc task. It generates an index.hml file. This file's timestamp is compared against Java and Classpath dependencies' timestamps in incremental builds. Because a standard file name "index.hml" is used for all JavaDoc Targets, it is recommended that each Javadoc Target be created in a separate directory, e.g. javadoc1/index.html, javadoc2/index.html, etc.

BuildTasks.Name: Set Classpath
BuildTasks.Description: Add dependencies to the Set Classpath Build Task that need to be included in the class path prior to compilation.

BuildTasks.Name: Ant Javadoc
BuildTasks.Description: Added .java or .class dependencies to the Ant Javadoc task will automatically be placed within a nested fileset in the generated build.xml file. Additional nested elements must be added in their entirety (including the tag markers) as options to the task or dependency. These will be automatically added to the Javadoc task.
